dcterms:creator: David Harrison, Jr.
Daniel L Rubinfeld
dcterms:description: The Boston housing dataset contains median home values in Boston, MA, that can be predicted by several covariates, including sensitive attributes, e.g., those related to race.
dcterms:title: Boston housing

dcterms:creator: Julia Angwin
Jeff Larson
Surya Mattu
Lauren Kirchner
dcterms:description: The COMPAS dataset was collected by ProPublica in 2016 and contains covariates, such as criminal history and demographics, the proprietary COMPAS risk score, and recidivism data for defendants from Broward County, Florida.
dcterms:title: COMPAS

dcterms:creator: Fair Isaac Corporation (FICO)
dcterms:description: The FICO HELOC dataset comprises anonymous HELOC applications made by consumers requesting a credit line in the range of $5,000 and $150,000. Given the credit history and characteristics of an applicant, the task is to predict whether they will be able to repay their HELOC account within two years.
dcterms:title: FICO HELOC

dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
LÃ©on Bottou
Yoshua Bengio
Patrick Haffner
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is a down-sampled version of handwritten digits, used to evaluate explainers on a CNN model. The dataset includes a subset of the 10 digits, specifically the digits 0, 1, 5, and 8.
dcterms:title: MNIST
